subject: Strategy shoots for the moon 🚀

Caption: 

### 📝 What you need to know

Don’t worry: Bitcoin treasury giant Strategy won’t take _all_ the BTC, co-founder and Executive Chairman Michael Saylor assured investors this week—but it does want to hold an even more massive share of the supply.

Not content with holding over $71 billion worth of BTC, or more than 3% of the current circulating supply, Saylor said Friday that he thinks the firm could ultimately [own upwards of 7%](https://decrypt.co/333164/strategy-could-buy-7-percent-bitcoin-supply-michael-saylor) of the total BTC supply. That’s 1.47 million BTC, or about $167 billion worth as of now.

"We wouldn't want to own all of it—we want everyone else to have their piece," said Saylor.

And that’s not all. Strategy CEO Phong Le said during Thursday’s earnings call that the company aims to [have the biggest corporate treasury](https://decrypt.co/333218/public-keys-strategy-metaplanet-bitcoin-coinbase-xrp), regardless of asset type, aiming to top Berkshire Hathaway’s $328 billion stash of cash and cash equivalents.
